info.name: Aidoru!Online dark purple
info.description:
This is just a colour coating for the default theme (Made by Nikkbu (http://nikkbu.info/)) and it does not include the forums section and the login section when logging onto the site however, some colours from torrent section of the site might carry over to the forum section(shown in 5th screenshot).
I also have no clue why the forums side is sticking to the left, if i find the problem i will try and fix it.

I have 0 coding experience and all I did was change colour values of the existing theme, Also If you find any weird coloured parts please send me a PM through the forums so i can look into it.

Upload torrents section is looking weird, i know. So expect an update soon.

There are parts i could not find but please don't see this as a permanent solution and see it as a temporary solution until admins make changable themes.

This was tested on waterfox. It should work with firefox.
info.additionalInfo:
Original A!O theme by http://nikkbu.info/

If you see something that shouldn't be there pm me. (i.e a yellow colour somewhere)
Known Bugs:
Smileys can't be seen in the comments box.
Text box colour is the same as the font colour while replying which causes the text to be invisible. This can be solved by pressing backspace before writing. If you know how to fix it within the css send me a pm.
Forums section sticks to the left for some reason. However if you ask me it's not that irritating.

17-07-20:
Removed the party hat. Party is over.
17-07-03:
Added a party hat to the logo for the one year anniversary of A!O.
17-06-20:
Made the commenting section dark.
17-02-02:
Made the left navigation brighter to not look totally out of place.
16-12-04:
Made the navigation menu on the left a bit brighter.
Fixed a line in the css.
16-11-11:
Changed table border colours on main torrent page.
16-11-06#4:
Bumped the logo down a bit and to the left.
16-11-06#3:
Now with a new header. Thanks to Itokatsu's dark grey theme.
16-11-06#2:
Removed gradient from bottom of buttons.
16-11-06:
Changed colour of the new bars. Removed gradient from back of the comment box. Changed a bunch of colours. If you find somewhere yellow that should not be yellow, do tell me.
16-08-02:
Shoutbox message text color fix.
16-07-23:
Made signature divider on torrent comment section dark purple.
16-07-21:
Made Thanks button darker.
16-07-05:
Changed Shoutbox writing colour to white.
16-07-04#2:
Fixed the torrent image stretched issue doing what kalemeister did.
16-07-04:
-Changed Shoutbox colours to darker and text to white.
